name: INFERIOR (Rage)
description:
Based on the old Atari Games “Derby Fishing” and “Pepsi Invaders”.  This game reverses the roles, you are no longer one of the competitive fisher, but the fish trying to survive.

Move between the lanes with the left and right arrow keys, press space to get out of a net and avoid the hooks! Eating a lure will attract other fish.

This Project was made within the "Retromorphosen" course at the ZHDK.
